alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Eastland; Erath (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 11:48PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Erath, eastern Eastland and Comanche Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1147 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms from near Ranger to Gorman to Brownwood, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stephenville, Comanche, Eastland, Dublin, Ranger, De Leon, Gorman, Gordon, Gustine, Lake Leon, Huckabay, Lake Olden, Bluff Dale, Morgan Mill, Proctor Lake, Carbon, Staff, Purves, Comyn and Kokomo. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 342 and 369. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central and north central Texas.
